hero.title: Services That Connect
hero.subtitle: We offer tailored solutions for healthcare professionals and German medical institutions.

healthcareProfessionals.title: For Healthcare Professionals
healthcareProfessionals.content: We support you on your journey to Germany’s healthcare system – from the first application to successful integration.
keyServices: Support in the recognition of your medical qualifications.
Specialized German courses for medical terms.
Access to attractive job offers in hospitals, clinics, and care facilities.
Assistance with visa applications, accommodation, and cultural integration.

medicalInstitutions.title: For Medical Institutions
medicalInstitutions.content: We simplify your access to a global pool of highly qualified professionals who not only meet your institution's requirements but also integrate well culturally.
keyServices: Recruitment of international talent tailored to your specific requirements.
Customized solutions to meet your institution's needs.
Long-term support throughout the integration process.
Optimized processes through digital and personal approaches.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose SA netz?
whyChoose.content: Whether you are a professional or an institution – our expertise, global network, and commitment to quality make the difference.
points: Individual consultation for professionals and institutions.
Holistic approach: from recruitment to integration.
Trusted partner with extensive industry knowledge.

exploreOpportunities.title: Your Journey Starts Here
exploreOpportunities.content: Find the right support for your needs – whether as a professional or an institution.
